attributes.action: Full Transparency on how and where Foreign Aid Funding is distributed
attributes.background: Tax Payers to be granted access to breakdown of Foreign Aid Funding

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition in its current form as it does not call for a clear action from the UK Government and Parliament. The Department for International Development already publishes statistics on international aid on a annual basis. You can read the statistics on international development for the year 2015 here: 

https://www.gov.uk/government/uploads/system/uploads/attachment_data/file/482322/SID2015c.pdf

If you would like the Government to publish additional information, you could start a new petition explaining clearly what information you would like to be published.
